name: Get Out! (itch) (tomeyro)
description:
Hello, agent.

Your mission is simple:

Hack the mainframe, steal the secrets, and...

GET OUT! (If you can...)

-----------------------------------

Play as an agent that was recruited to steal important documents for "La Resistencia", and get out of the building without getting caught. Or you could also just get the key and escape. It is your choice.

Each time you play, a new building maze is auto generated, and you can select the size*. The more rooms you add, the longer it'll take you to escape.

There are 5 unique rooms with 20 possible positions.

* Recommended size to play is 5: fun and not repetitive.

Once you escape, share your score on the comments section below!

-----------------------------------

Movement: W A S D

Interact (doors, items, computer): Space Bar

Open/close the map: M

Open/close the menu: ESC

-----------------------------------

This game was developed for the N8Jam using the Godot Engine.

You can find the project with the source code in my GitHub: tomeyro/get-out-game.

-----------------------------------

Sound effects are from: https://freesound.org.

And the music is from: https://soundimage.org.
